title: After Waking up Beside the Villain - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Ancient China   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Cultivation   e-Sports   Genius Protagonist   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Movies   Mpreg   Multiple Realms   Power Couple   Seme Protagonist   Showbiz   Transmigration   Vampires   World Hopping
author: 苏城哑人
description:
Chu Yunsheng’s head hurts every time he wakes up. Because he is usually either lying in the villain’s bed, or had just gotten up from the villain’s bed.

The reason why villains are called villains is because they are extremely lethal and vengeful… and they love to blacken…

Villain: Bastard, I will castrate you!

Chu Yunsheng: …Oh.>
